**小盾牌**（small shield）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[盾牌](/wiki/%E7%9B%BE%E7%89%8C "盾牌")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它由[木头](/index.php?title=%E6%9C%A8%E5%A4%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "木头 (page does not exist)")制成。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 描述](#.E6.8F.8F.E8.BF.B0)

  - [5.4 SpliceHack](#SpliceHack)
  - [5.5 EvilHack](#EvilHack)
  - [5.6 SlashTHEM](#SlashTHEM)
  - [5.7 Hack'EM](#Hack.27EM)

- [6 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

[骑士](/index.php?title=%E9%AA%91%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "骑士 (page does not exist)")和[牧师](/index.php?title=%E7%89%A7%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "牧师 (page does not exist)")在游戏开始时会获得一面+0小盾牌[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。[女武神](/index.php?title=%E5%A5%B3%E6%AD%A6%E7%A5%9E\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "女武神 (page does not exist)")在游戏开始时会获得一面+3小盾牌[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。

[兽人](/index.php?title=%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA%EF%BC%88%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%A7%8D%E6%97%8F%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "兽人（起始种族） (page does not exist)")族的角色在游戏开始时若会获得小盾牌，则改为获得一面[兽人盾](/wiki/%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA%E7%9B%BE "兽人盾")。不过，游戏中所有开局时携带小盾牌的职业都无法选择兽人作为起始种族，因此该替换机制在游戏中不会发生[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)。

[雇佣兵](/index.php?title=%E9%9B%87%E4%BD%A3%E5%85%B5\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "雇佣兵 (page does not exist)")类怪物在生成时有2⁄3的概率[获得](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一面小盾牌[\[7\]](#cite_note-7)。[阵营祭司](/index.php?title=%E9%98%B5%E8%90%A5%E7%A5%AD%E5%8F%B8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "阵营祭司 (page does not exist)")、[高阶祭司](/index.php?title=%E9%AB%98%E9%98%B6%E7%A5%AD%E5%8F%B8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "高阶祭司 (page does not exist)")和[大祭司](/index.php?title=%E5%A4%A7%E7%A5%AD%E5%8F%B8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "大祭司 (page does not exist)")在生成时总会携带小盾牌[\[8\]](#cite_note-8)。

## 描述

小盾牌的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为1，且穿戴时会阻碍[施法](/index.php?title=%E6%96%BD%E6%B3%95\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "施法 (page does not exist)")。不过，小盾牌对施法成功率的惩罚低于其他盾牌[\[9\]](#cite_note-penalty-9)。

## 策略

- *主条目：[盾牌#策略](/wiki/%E7%9B%BE%E7%89%8C#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5 "盾牌")*

小盾牌是施法角色和低[携带容量](/index.php?title=%E6%90%BA%E5%B8%A6%E5%AE%B9%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "携带容量 (page does not exist)")角色的最佳选择。对其他角色来说，[精灵盾](/wiki/%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%E7%9B%BE "精灵盾")则是更优解：它的基础AC更高，安全附魔上限更高，缺点则是比小盾牌重10 [aum](/index.php?title=Aum/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Aum/zh-CN (page does not exist)")，且施法惩罚更高。

女武神初始获得的小盾牌附魔等级很高，可以使用很长一段时间，不过到中后期一般都会为了[双持武器](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%8C%E6%8C%81%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "双持武器 (page does not exist)")而舍弃盾牌。

## 历史

小盾牌最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏，用以取代[NetHack 2.3e](/wiki/NetHack_2.3e "NetHack 2.3e")及更早版本中的[盾牌](/index.php?title=%E7%9B%BE%E7%89%8C%EF%BC%88%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "盾牌（物品） (page does not exist)")物品——早期版本的盾牌物品和小盾牌相似，但是由[金属类](/index.php?title=%E9%87%91%E5%B1%9E%E7%B1%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "金属类 (page does not exist)")材料制成，因此会生锈。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Small_shield/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

In variants with [object materials](/wiki/Object_materials "Object materials") systems, shields larger than the small shield may be exempt from additional spellcasting penalties if they are made of a lightweight, non-metallic material such as [bone](/wiki/Bone "Bone") or [wood](/wiki/Wood "Wood").[\[9\]](#cite_note-penalty-9)

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), Priests start the game with a +2 small shield.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"), the small shield is renamed to the **buckler**, and it grants 1 base AC and 0 [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") while worn.

### xNetHack

In [xNetHack](/wiki/XNetHack "XNetHack"), small shields are surpassed as the ideal shield for spellcasting by elven shields, since they work identically due to spellcasting system changes - the small shield's slightly lower weight is one of its few advantages in comparison.

### SpliceHack

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), a small shield can be combined with an [amulet of reflection](/wiki/Amulet_of_reflection "Amulet of reflection") at a [furnace](/wiki/Furnace "Furnace") to create a [shield of reflection](/wiki/Shield_of_reflection "Shield of reflection").

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), all racial replacements for roles starting with small shields are commented out.

Mercenaries that are not [elves](/wiki/Elf_\(monster_attribute\) "Elf (monster attribute)"), [drow](/wiki/Drow_\(monster_attribute\) "Drow (monster attribute)") or [orcs](/wiki/Orc_\(monster_attribute\) "Orc (monster attribute)") have a 2⁄3 chance of being generated with small shields.

A small shield can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining a [dagger](/wiki/Dagger "Dagger") and a [helmet](/wiki/Helmet "Helmet"); a small shield and an [elven dagger](/wiki/Elven_dagger "Elven dagger") can be combined to create an elven shield.

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), in addition to SLASH'EM details, [Warriors](/wiki/Warrior "Warrior") and [Paladins](/wiki/Paladin_\(role\) "Paladin (role)") start each game with a +0 small shield. Dwarvish, elven and orcish characters in roles that start with small shields will start the game with a race-appropriate shield instead.

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), upgrading a small shield will produce an elven shield, and vice versa.

Elven Knights can upgrade their starting small shield into an elven shield with relative ease.

## 引用及注释

小盾牌（small shield）是NetHack中的一种盾牌类防具。它由木头制成。

Contents

  • 2 描述

生成

骑士和牧师在游戏开始时会获得一面+0小盾牌[1][2]。女武神在游戏开始时会获得一面+3小盾牌[3]。

兽人族的角色在游戏开始时若会获得小盾牌，则改为获得一面兽人盾。不过，游戏中所有开局时携带小盾牌的职业都无法选择兽人作为起始种族，因此该替换机制在游戏中不会发生[4][5][6]。

雇佣兵类怪物在生成时有2⁄3的概率获得一面小盾牌[7]。阵营祭司、高阶祭司和大祭司在生成时总会携带小盾牌[8]。

描述

小盾牌的基础AC加成为1，且穿戴时会阻碍施法。不过，小盾牌对施法成功率的惩罚低于其他盾牌[9]。

策略

主条目：盾牌#策略

小盾牌是施法角色和低携带容量角色的最佳选择。对其他角色来说，精灵盾则是更优解：它的基础AC更高，安全附魔上限更高，缺点则是比小盾牌重10 aum，且施法惩罚更高。

女武神初始获得的小盾牌附魔等级很高，可以使用很长一段时间，不过到中后期一般都会为了双持武器而舍弃盾牌。

历史

小盾牌最初于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏，用以取代NetHack 2.3e及更早版本中的盾牌物品——早期版本的盾牌物品和小盾牌相似，但是由金属类材料制成，因此会生锈。

Variants

您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

In variants with object materials systems, shields larger than the small shield may be exempt from additional spellcasting penalties if they are made of a lightweight, non-metallic material such as bone or wood.[9]

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, Priests start the game with a +2 small shield.

dNetHack

In dNetHack and notdNetHack, the small shield is renamed to the buckler, and it grants 1 base AC and 0 DR while worn.

xNetHack

In xNetHack, small shields are surpassed as the ideal shield for spellcasting by elven shields, since they work identically due to spellcasting system changes - the small shield's slightly lower weight is one of its few advantages in comparison.

SpliceHack

In SpliceHack, a small shield can be combined with an amulet of reflection at a furnace to create a shield of reflection.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, all racial replacements for roles starting with small shields are commented out.

Mercenaries that are not elves, drow or orcs have a 2⁄3 chance of being generated with small shields.

A small shield can be created at a forge by combining a dagger and a helmet; a small shield and an elven dagger can be combined to create an elven shield.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, in addition to SLASH'EM details, Warriors and Paladins start each game with a +0 small shield. Dwarvish, elven and orcish characters in roles that start with small shields will start the game with a race-appropriate shield instead.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, upgrading a small shield will produce an elven shield, and vice versa.

Elven Knights can upgrade their starting small shield into an elven shield with relative ease.

A small shield can be created at a [[Forge (dungeon feature)|forge]] by combining a [[dagger]] and a [[helmet]]; a small shield and an [[elven dagger]] can be combined to create an elven shield.

===SlashTHEM===
In [[SlashTHEM]], in addition to SLASH'EM details, [[Warrior]]s and [[Paladin (role)|Paladins]] start each game with a +0 small shield. Dwarvish, elven and orcish characters in roles that start with small shields will start the game with a race-appropriate shield instead.

===Hack'EM===
In [[Hack'EM]], upgrading a small shield will produce an elven shield, and vice versa.

Elven Knights can upgrade their starting small shield into an elven shield with relative ease.
